author: Dinakar Peri
text:
In a late development on Sunday night, ex-servicemen, protesting outside Finance Minister Arun Jaitley’s residence over the issue of One Rank One Pension (OROP), called off their protest after assurance from the Minister of State for Finance Jayant Sinha.

Veterans who had been protesting at Jantar Mantar for several months over discrepancies in the government notification, on Sunday began a stir outside Mr. Jaitley’s residence.

“Consequent to certain back channel initiative, a meeting between an ex-servicemen delegation and Mr. Sinha took place in a very cordial environment late last [Sunday] night,” Col. Anil Kaul (retd.), media adviser of the Indian Ex-Servicemen Movement said.
title: Veterans call off protest outside Jaitley’s residence
